column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I have been to a number of ramen restaurants in Houston and Jinya is in my top two. My overall favorite ramen place is Santouka ramen usually found inside Mitsuwa grocery stores. Unfortunately
column2: Houston does not have one. The ramen was good with a well flavored broth and pork. The noodles were perfect and to my liking. Overall a good experience! I enjoyed the atmosphere and the restaurant staff. Depending on when you go the wait maybe long... I originally went on a Friday night and was told the wait was 45 minutes for a party of 2. I decided not to wait and went next door to the pizza place because I was hungry. I should not have done that. I was really disappointed. I returned Saturday afternoon Jinya and left happy! I will be back to Jinya
